title: Stop American weapons from killing civilians in Gaza
description: Following Hamas atrocities in Israel earlier this month, the Israeli government mounted a counteroffensive in which it reportedly dropped 6,000 bombs on Gaza — an area about double the size of Washington, D.C., with triple the population — in the first several days. description: Sen. Tim Scott (R-S.C.) in a Monday speech from Chicago warned that the radical left is spreading a “sinister” agenda meant to deny the progress the nation has made in addressing racism. title: Bipartisan lawmakers oppose White House nursing home staffing proposal

title: Kirby further sidesteps questions on if US asking Israel to delay ground invasion
description: The White House on Monday further sidestepped questions on whether that it was asking Israel to delay its expected ground invasion after reports suggested it was doing so in the hopes that more hostages would be released. title: Biden should force an end to the House budget brinksmanship — now
description: This is no way to run a business or a government. America's chief executive should make an issue of it and insist that Congress not take another break until it does its job.

title: Remnants of ancient catastrophe show the moon is 40 million years older than we thought
description: The moon's violent birth may have happened 40 million years earlier than scientists previously thought. That finding is based on remnants of molten crystals recovered from the moon's surface, according to a study published on Monday in Geochemical Perspectives Letters. These slivers of radioactive zircon are almost infinitesimally small — so tiny they must be evaluated atom-by-atom. But...

title: Gaza health ministry: More than 5,000 people killed in war with Israel
description: The death toll in Gaza rose above 5,000 people on Monday, according to the Hamas-run health ministry, as civilians in the besieged territory come under heavy Israeli air strikes.
